response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our exclusive product to you. This remarkable item holds immense value and has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. Given its exceptional quality and uniqueness, we believe it is worth more than $1,000,000 to you. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $950,000. This represents a significant saving for you while ensuring you receive unparalleled value. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve you with this extraordinary product.", "product_price": 950000}
